nodes.name: Firewatch Bolthole
nodes.summary: This mod adds a secret, yet convenient player home within the Firewatch Sewers for those who need a place to hide. Choose between a furnished version or a non-furnished version.

nodes.name: Message Box
nodes.summary: This MWSE mod provides a message box that can entirely replace vanilla/modded notifications and track them. Choose between basic message logging, combat logging, exploration logging, quest logging, and more. No more losing track of

nodes.name: Pet Shops of Vvardenfell
nodes.summary: This simple ESP mod adds 10 pet shops scattered across Vvardenfell, where you can purchase various lore-friendly creatures that can follow you, carry items, be fed by you, and be pet by you. Very light on scripting to ensure maximum

nodes.name: Defined Difficulty
nodes.summary: Requires MWSE. Allows you to change how the vanilla difficulty slider works and define a difficulty curve. Functions include affecting physical damage, spell resistance, NPC stats, potion strength, repair effectiveness, chance to

nodes.name: Aquatic Ascendancy
nodes.summary: This mod allows Argonian players and NPCs to innately breathe underwater, swim faster, and rest underwater. Optionally, these benefits can also be given to vampires as well as all races.

nodes.name: Daily Training
nodes.summary: This MWSE mod allows you to spend time training rather than wasting time waiting. Gain small experience in trained skill per hour trained, with or without restrictions. Allows the accumulation of a daily streak.  Configurable limits based

nodes.name: Companion Leveler
nodes.summary: This MWSE mod allows both NPC and Creature companions to level up with the player based on their Class/Creature Type (Class Mode) or specific player selected build settings (Build Mode). In Class Mode, you also have the choice of changing

nodes.name: Friendly Intervention
nodes.summary: A MWSE mod that allows any companion to teleport with the player when using Recall/Intervention spells for free or with restrictions/cost for more immersion. New Teleport Menu allows companions to teleport the party themselves as well.

nodes.name: Time Consumer
nodes.summary: This MWSE mod passes time when enchanting, repairing, performing alchemy, making and learning spells, bartering, talking, and looting. Can be used alone for immersion or with other mods that introduce time sensitive mechanics such as hunger
